project_digit_recognizer_desc: A fully hand-rolled multilayer perceptron written in Go, with zero ML dependencies. Implements every component from scratch: forward and backward passes, ReLU and Softmax activations, cross-entropy loss, He weight initialisation, and mini-batch SGD. Trained on 60,000 MNIST images, it reaches 97.4% accuracy on the 10,000-image test set. The source code is intentionally written as a learning artifact — every concept (backprop, the chain rule, overfitting, normalisation) is explained in plain English directly in comments, making the codebase a readable reference for programmers new to machine learning.
project_ef_group_desc: A collection of libraries for building type-safe API clients in TypeScript using the Fetch API, including a core client builder and several plugins.
project_ef_core_desc: A type-safe API client builder for TypeScript using the Fetch API. Features dynamic paths, custom handlers, and full type inference for inputs and outputs.
project_ef_docs_desc: Documentation website for endpoint-fetcher built with Next.js and Nextra, providing comprehensive guides, API references, and examples.
project_ef_cache_desc: Caching plugin for endpoint-fetcher with type-safe wrapper support.
project_ef_retry_desc: A configurable retry plugin for endpoint-fetcher with multiple retry strategies and advanced configuration options.

privacy_intro: I value your privacy as much as I value my own. This website (lorenzovecchio.dev) is built to be a fast, clean, and privacy-respecting space.
privacy_no_cookies: This website does not use cookies. I do not use any tracking pixels, advertising beacons, or any other technology that stores information on your device or tracks you across the web.
privacy_analytics_intro: I use Umami Analytics to understand how visitors interact with my site (e.g., which projects are the most popular). Umami is a privacy-focused, open-source alternative to Google Analytics.
privacy_analytics_li1_body: Umami does not collect any personally identifiable information (PII).
privacy_analytics_li2_body: Your IP address is never stored. It is used only to determine general geographic data (like country) and is then immediately discarded.
privacy_analytics_li3_body: You are not tracked across different websites or devices.
privacy_data_intro: Any data collected is used strictly for the purpose of improving this website and understanding its reach.
privacy_data_li1: I do not sell your data.
privacy_data_li2: I do not share your data with third parties for marketing or advertising purposes.
privacy_gdpr: The processing of anonymous analytical data is based on Legitimate Interest (Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR). This allows me to improve the website's performance and content without impacting your fundamental rights and freedoms, as no personal data is processed.
privacy_rights: Even though I do not collect personal data that could identify you, you still have the right to inquire about my data practices. Since no individual identifiers are stored, I cannot "delete" or "export" your specific data because I have no way of knowing which data belongs to you.
